about.heading: Hi, I'm Shobhit
content: I am passionate about using UX/UI and IxD to design user-friendly products, environments and systems. I use my skills in user research, user testing and prototyping to implement designs. I love solving problems and tackling new challenges. I look forward towards understanding the userâ€™s requirements and perspective in order to create great user experiences.
I am skilled with Figma, Photoshop and InDesign.
